name: Sicarius (Lunnos)
description:
In this game, you play as an assassin who has to kill innocent villagers who are too weak to hurt you in any way. Only, they left traps on the road and these will be fatal for you. You will have to infiltrate the king's castle while he is away and dodge the traps of his subjects. If you get to the end of the castle, you win! If you succeed, chaos will fall on the kingdom... Will you be strong enough to succeed in your quest?

Keybinds:

- A and D or directional arrows to move
- Left click to attack
- Right click to parry
- Space to jump (with double jump)
